publicationStmt.publisher: [Imprinted at London in Fletestrete by Thomas Berthelet,
publicationStmt.date: the seconde of Iuly] An. M.D.XLV. [1545]

notesStmt.note: By Sir Thomas Elyot, whose name appears on A2r.
Printer's name and day of printing from colophon.
The woodcut title page border has "1534" in the lower sill.
The last leaf contains a printer's mark only.
Running title reads: A preseruatiue agaynst deathe.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
